short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Speed up your browsing with your most used bookmarks always on deck

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lightweight and so easy to use you may not even notice it! Blazing Bookmarks automatically organizes your bookmarks bar as you browse, percolating your most visited bookmarks up to the top! All of your favorite bookmarks organized for you without any effort. Blazing Bookmarks will help you browse your favorite sites faster and easier than ever. (formerly named Hot Bookmarks)
